description:
Qualifications

Required:

  • Minimum of 1+ years of research administration experience.
  • Minimum of 1+ years of financial, clerical, or administrative experience.
  • Interpersonal skills to effectively communicate information and establish cooperative working relationships.
  • Ability to work as a member of a team.
  • Ability to set priorities and complete ongoing tasks with competing deadlines.
  • Close attention to detail in a fast-paced, fluctuating workload environment.
  • Demonstrated proficiency with Adobe and Microsoft suite software, especially Excel.
  • High School Diploma

Preferred

  • Bachelor’s degree in finance or related field, or equivalent administration experience.
  • Organization skills to create and maintain administrative and financial files effectively.
